name: ai-research-agent
author: vtempest
description: Search and outline a topic base with AI Research Agent

scripts.prod: cd web-app; vite build; wrangler deploy; wrangler tail
scripts.docs: jsdoc -c jsdoc.json src/keyphrases/* src/topic-distribution/*  src/autocomplete/*  src/match/* src/autocomplete/*  src/extractor/**/* src/tokenize/*  src/wiki-api/* src/extractor/url-to-content/*  src/similarity/* src/search-web/* -t node_modules/better-docs/ ; npm run open
